comments:
I got the following NPE while remote profiling a J2EE applicatigon on a WAS 5.1 
server.
I had a few of the views open and had already refreshed views once or twice.
I have not been able to reproduce it yet.  I did try, but was unable to make it 
happen again. Originally, I had switched between a couple of views:
1. Performance Call Graph 
2. Method Details
3. Instance stats

Even though I only had selected J2EE profiling, I still was able to select 
filter sets... will write another defect for that on actools....

I had the following contents in my profiing set
1. Execution Time analysis
2. Thread analysis
3. Memory/leak analysis

(Submitted on bahalf of rabone@us.ibm.com, who filed this in RATLC as 974405. 
Looks like a Hyades defect, so transferring here.)
Mewa, please have a look and see if you can reproduce this.

I tried to reproduce this NPE using various test scenario, but have not able to 
get it. Please send more info on how to reproduce it.

All attempts at reproducing this bug were futile. If, able to gain reproducible 
scenario, please re-open the bug.
